participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and passionate about animals, enjoys learning and has a laid-back style.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and empathetic, with a quirky sense of style and a deep love for animals.
participant_2.background: i'm an animal activist. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. my age is too old to say. the holidays make me depressed.
